# Growth mindset
***[A growth mindset](https://www.google.com/search?q=what+is+growth+mindset&sca_esv=582230352&rlz=1C1GCEA_enVN1079VN1079&sxsrf=AM9HkKnOkG0tzrlUnlnk4gyuULRTJY-Zmw%3A1699956451994&ei=40ZTZbCdPMSaseMPlLmViAk&oq=what+is+growth&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp), proposed by Stanford professor Carol Dweck in her _book Mindset_, describes people who _believe_ that their success depends on _time and effort_. People with a growth mindset feel their skills and intelligence can be improved with effort and persistence.***
- 3 reminders to yourself of how to keep yourself in a growth mindset
   - Embrace challenges
   - I can train my brain
   - Effort is a path to mastery
   - Learn from feedback
   - Inspired by success of others
```sh
git add $file1 $file2 $file3
```
